title: Rush command-line.json config file
description: For use with the Rush tool, this file defines custom command line commands. See http://rushjs.io for details.

commandKind.title: Command Kind
commandKind.description: Indicates the kind of command: "bulk" commands are run separately for each project; "global" commands are run once for the entire repository.

name.title: Custom Command Name
name.description: The name of the custom command, which can be invoked via "rush <name>"

summary.title: Custom Command Summary
summary.description: A short summary of the custom command, which will appear when printing command line usage (e.g. "rush --help")

description.title: Custom Command Description
description.description: A detailed description of the command, which appears when requesting help for the command (e.g. "rush --help my-command"). If omitted, the summary will be used.

parallelized.title: Parallelized
parallelized.description: Describes whether or not this command can be run in parallel (i.e. executed simultaneously for multiple projects).

ignoreMissingScript.title: Ignore Missing Script
ignoreMissingScript.description: Normally Rush requires that each project's package.json has a "scripts" entry matching the custom command name. To disable this check, set "ignoreMissingScript" to true.

scriptPath.title: Script Path
scriptPath.description: The relative path to a JavaScript file that will be invoked using the NodeJS engine.  The path is relative to the repository root folder that contains rush.json.

parameterKind.title: Parameter Kind
parameterKind.description: Indicates the kind of syntax for this command-line parameter: "flag" or "choice"

longName.title: Long Name
longName.description: The name the parameter (e.g. "--verbose").  This is a required field.

shortName.title: Short Name
shortName.description: A optional short form of the parameter (e.g. "-v" instead of "--verbose")

description.title: Custom Parameter Description
description.description: A detailed description of the parameter, which appears when requesting help for the command (e.g. "rush --help my-command").

associatedCommands.title: Associated Commands
associatedCommands.description: A list of custom commands and/or built-in Rush commands that this parameter may be used with

alternatives.title: Alternatives
alternatives.description: A list of alternative argument values that can be chosen for this parameter.

name.title: Name of Alternative
name.description: A token that is one of the alternatives that can be used with the choice parameter, e.g. "vanilla" in "--flavor vanilla"

description.title: Description of Alternative
description.description: A detailed description for the alternative that will be shown in the command-line help.

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: If the parameter is omitted from the command line, this value will be inserted by default

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

commands.title: Custom Commands
commands.description: A list of custom commands that affect all projects in the repository.  These commands are invoked from the Rush command line.

parameters.title: Custom Parameters
parameters.description: A list of custom command-line parameters that can be associated with custom commands and Rush's built-in commands.
